main-articles.title: Dow tumbles more than 500 points as hot inflation data stokes fears about higher-for-longer rates
main-articles.content: Stocks took a dive Tuesday after a key inflation report revealed stubborn price increases, raising concerns on Wall Street that the Federal Reserve will keep rates higher for longer than anticipated.

articles-3.title: Here’s why the Fed cares about the cost of your haircut and doctor’s visit
articles-3.content: America’s inflation problem has improved greatly in some respects — but it remains stubborn for the price of services.
